feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Fiori
feed.subtitle: SAP Fiori Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: SAPUI5 application was not uploaded or registered successfully in Visual Studio Code
entry.content:
Hi colleagues,

 

Good day, here is a problem which blocks our development and needs your support to find the solution.

I confirmed all configurations are correct and TR is ready there.

 

===========================================================

 System Information: System Name: migrtn-enhance Product: s4hana-ce Codeline: ic Release: 2608 Variant: customer-conf Version: 20251208 Thanks a lot ----------------- While execute command: npm run deploy, not able to deploy UI files to this system. Logs as below: (verified the BSP name and TR is correct, and it works before.) cus.sd.salesprices.manage@0.0.1 deploy > npm run build && fiori deploy --config ui5-deploy.yaml && rimraf archive.zip > cus.sd.salesprices.manage@0.0.1 build > ui5 build -a --clean-dest --include-task=generateCachebusterInfo info ProjectBuilder Preparing build for project cus.sd.salesprices.manage info ProjectBuilder Target directory: ./dist info ProjectBuilder Cleaning target directory... info Project 1 of 1: ❯ Building application project cus.sd.salesprices.manage... info cus.sd.salesprices.manage › Running task escapeNonAsciiCharacters... info cus.sd.salesprices.manage › Running task replaceCopyright... info cus.sd.salesprices.manage › Running task replaceVersion... info cus.sd.salesprices.manage › Running task minify... info cus.sd.salesprices.manage › Running task generateFlexChangesBundle... info cus.sd.salesprices.manage › Running task generateComponentPreload... info cus.sd.salesprices.manage › Running task generateCachebusterInfo... info ProjectBuilder Build succeeded in 1.45 s info ProjectBuilder Executing cleanup tasks... Confirmation is required to deploy the app: You chose not to validate SSL certificate. Please verify the server certificate is trustful before proceeding. See documentation for recommended configuration (https://help.sap.com/viewer/17d50220bcd848aa854c9c182d65b699/Latest/en-US/4b318bede7eb4021a8be385c46c74045.html). entry.title: Roadmap to Become SAP BTP Platform Expert (From Fiori Dev/Admin) + Certification Exam Changes
entry.content:
Hello Community,

I am currently working as an SAP Fiori Developer and Fiori Administrator. My goal is to grow into a full SAP BTP Platform Expert who can own the platform end-to-end (administration, integration, extension, security, and architecture).

Could you please help with:

  1. A concise certification roadmap or PDF for becoming an SAP BTP Platform Expert (beyond Fiori Dev/Admin).

  2. Guidance on which skills and certifications are essential to move from Fiori focused roles to platform ownership.

  3. Any updates on certification exam changes from January especially whether exams will include practical / hands-on components in addition to MCQs.

Any official SAP links, blogs, or experience-based advice would be highly appreciated.

Thanks in advance.
Ashwin

entry.title: UI5 Public variant issu after transport request
entry.content:
Dear Team,

 

we have two systems : 100, 110.

I have imported public UI5 variant from 100 to 110

now we need to update the variante directly in client 110, but the variant imported are locked. 

the variant, initialy created in the 110 are not locked 

 

I could not find any table, information about this lock status. Looks like the TADIR table with source system.

Do you know how to release all the variants in system 110 ?

 

Best regards

Fred

entry.title: Issues Displaying External Content About site Within SAP Fiori Launchpad
entry.content: Hello I am working with an SAP Fiori Launchpad project where I need to embed external informational content pages into a custom tile view. I am experiencing layout and security issues where some embedded iframes do not render correctly or are blocked by Content Security Policy headers. Has anyone encountered similar problems embedding external content into Fiori and what best practices helped resolve rendering or security restrictions thanks

entry.title: Fiori RAP - service oDataV2 - Aggregation + datapoint field - progress bar not loading
entry.content:
I created an RAP app (analyticTable)  that I am using the annotation aggregation to sum a field with value, in the same list I have another field that I am using the datapoint to visualize a progress bar,  the sum it is working well but the field with progress bar stay disable without value, if I go to the object page and return to list page the progress bar to this row is showed right.  
Anyone already seen this problem ?

entry.title: Is there any standard way to achieve manage global hierarchies in SAP S4 Hana Cloud
entry.content:
Hi Team,

The current implementation of two global hierarchies in the SAPUI5 Fiori app, bound to a tree table, requires four API calls per hierarchy. Scaling this to 12 hierarchies would necessitate 48 API calls, leading to significant performance degradation, data latency, and potential application crashes. Consequently, utilizing a custom ui5 Fiori app for retrieving multiple hierarchies is inefficient. Additionally, for every hierarchy in 4 th API call - need to aggregate the amount if id is unique. So multiple unique ids present applicable for all hierarchies, So achieving global hierarchy in SBS is not a good option with multiple api calls and data calculation in every 4 th api call and data wil be millions in production.

I suggested that the client, SBS fiori app is not a good option to achieve this requirement by calling APIS 48 times, every hierarchy we need to check repeated ids and calculate the total amount for unique id in the back end.

Also fiori app will use for limited data set. Not like million records calculations in the backend .

 

Question : - 

We are trying to build a GL Line Item report that has the functionality to display the report in "multiple global hierarchies" such as profit center, cost center and GL Account (total 12 multiple global hierarchies) in the same report. Side by side application has limitations, we want to know if there is a standard functionality to achieve this.

 

Thanks,

Madhava

entry.title: Add Value Help to field ProductForEdit in Fiori App Manage Product Master (F1602)
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I am trying to add an additional value to the “Product” field (ProductForEdit) in C_Product and then use it in the Fiori app “Manage Product Master (F1602)”. But it is not displayed in the app. I suspect that the MD_C_PRODUCT_MAINTAIN_SRV service is doing something (such as hard-coding value helps in _mpc – although I can't find them...) to override the annotations.

Here are all possible value helps for the “Product” field (/ProductForEdit):



My metadata extension to C_Product:

@Metadata.layer: #CORE
annotate entity C_Product with
{
  @Consumption.valueHelpDefinition: [ { entity: { name: 'I_ProductStdVH', element: 'Product' },
                                        label: 'Products by Description' },
                                      { entity: { name: 'I_ProductByPlantVH', element: 'Product' },
                                        qualifier: 'ProdPlant',
                                        label: 'Products by Plant' },
                                      { entity: { name: 'I_ProductByDistributionChainVH', element: 'Product' },
                                        qualifier: 'ProdDistrChain',
                                        label: 'Products by Distribution Chain' },
                                      { entity: { name: 'I_ProdByEWMWarehouseVH', element: 'Product' },
                                        qualifier: 'ProdEwm',
                                        label: 'Products by EWM Warehouse' },
                                      { entity: { name: 'I_ProductByChangeMasterVH', element: 'Product' },
                                        qualifier: 'ProdChangeMaster',
                                        label: 'Products by Change Number' },
                                      { entity: { name: 'I_ProductByValuationVH', element: 'Product' },
                                        qualifier: 'ProdValuation',
                                        label: 'Products by Valuation' },
                                      { entity: { name: 'ZI_ProductByMatchcodeVH', element: 'matnr' },
                                        qualifier: 'ProdMatch',
                                        label: 'Products by Matchcode' } ]
  ProductForEdit;
}

Here, I simply copied the annotation Consumption.valueHelpDefinition from C_Product and added my own value help. I can see that I am in the right place because when I remove some of the standard value helps, they are also removed from the app. However, my addition is not displayed.

When I create my own service based on c_product (and preview the app), I can see all value helps, including my own – so the code/annotations are correct. It just doesn't work via the MD_C_PRODUCT_MAINTAIN_SRV service.

Does anyone have any idea how to solve this problem?

Many thanks,
Janik

entry.title: How to Deploy a Custom Fiori App from DEV Subaccount to PROD Subaccount in SAP BTP (Cloud Foundry)?

What is the recommended and correct approach to deploy a custom Fiori app from a DEV subaccount to a PROD subaccount in SAP BTP?

entry.title: DataPoint PropertyValue Property="ReferenceValue" not displayed
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I built an Overviewpage ( OVP ) app with an analytical card in VisualStudioCode. I added Datapoint with TrendCalculation. In VSCode runs it right. 

the target is being displayed, as you can see here:

 

But, after deplying to the backend ( S4 on demand ) the value is not being displayed. 

as you can see here: 

 

sapui versions are both the same: 1.120.30. There are no other changes.

There is no difference wether value is pulled from odata or hardcodiert:

                                <PropertyValue Property="TrendCalculation">
                                    <Record Type="UI.TrendCalculationType">
                                        <PropertyValue Property="ReferenceValue" Path="Goal"/>
                                        <PropertyValue Property="IsRelativeDifference" Bool="true"/>
                                        <PropertyValue Property="UpDifference" Decimal="1"/>
                                        <PropertyValue Property="StrongUpDifference" Decimal="2"/>
                                        <PropertyValue Property="DownDifference" Decimal="-1"/>
                                        <PropertyValue Property="StrongDownDifference" Decimal="-2"/>
                                    </Record>
                                </PropertyValue>

 

makes no difference:

                                <PropertyValue Property="TrendCalculation">
                                    <Record Type="UI.TrendCalculationType">
                                        <PropertyValue Property="ReferenceValue" String="90"/>
                                        <PropertyValue Property="IsRelativeDifference" Bool="true"/>
                                        <PropertyValue Property="UpDifference" Decimal="1"/>
                                        <PropertyValue Property="StrongUpDifference" Decimal="2"/>
                                        <PropertyValue Property="DownDifference" Decimal="-1"/>
                                        <PropertyValue Property="StrongDownDifference" Decimal="-2"/>
                                    </Record>
                                </PropertyValue>

if I analyse the field in the UI5 here is VSCode / local:

 

and here backend: 

 

no matter if with odata or hardcodiert, the field formatted is in the backend empty and local is filled with a value. that is what is being displayed.  I am stuck.

please help!

Regards

Jarda

entry.title: Fiori Elements Extensions – When to use controller extensions vs. handlers?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m currently working with Fiori elements applications and I’m trying to better understand the usage extensibility options:

  • controller extensions

  • event/extension handlers

What I think I understand so far:

  • controller extensions seem to be more related to page lifecycle (onInit, onBeforeRendering, etc.) and manipulating generated controls

  • handlers seem to be more related to user actions or specific control events (button press, validation, value help, etc.)

But there are still situations where the border is blurry for me.

I’m not just looking for definitions from documentation, but for experience-based explanations, examples, and best practices from people who use Fiori elements extensions in real projects.

Thanks in advance for any insights,

Mikolaj

entry.title: Custom fields added to extended SEGW OData entity not available in metadata
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

In Fiori App ID: F0843 (Post Goods Receipt for Purchasing Document), we are trying to add some custom fields in entity GR4PO_DL_Item of OData service MMIM_GR4PO_DL_SRV by redefinition and importing properties that are already available as an .include in the line item type MMIM_GR4PO_DL_ITEM.

After this we redefined "Define" method of MPC_EXT class with code:

  METHOD define.

  super->define( ).

  DATA(lo_entity_type) = model->get_entity_type( iv_entity_name = 'GR4PO_DL_Item' ).

  " Expand the specific include structure to expose its fields
  lo_entity_type->add_auto_expand_include(
    EXPORTING
      iv_include_name     = 'MMIM_GR4PO_DL_ITEM'
      iv_bind_conversions = abap_true
  ).
ENDMETHOD.

We followed the same approach as shown in this learning journey:

https://learning.sap.com/courses/building-odata-services-with-sap-gateway/redefining-an-sap-gateway-service

We already generated the Runtime objects and there seems to be no error as metadata loading properly. However, in the metadata the custom fields are not available and we are not sure what could be missing. The metadata does show the all the inlcudes but does not show the fields added to include, even though they are available in extended entity type.

Did someone face similar situation and can help in finding the solution?

entry.title: How to make standard Fiori apps open an extended Fiori app instead of the standard one?
entry.content:
Hello experts, good morning.

I would like to ask for your guidance regarding an issue we are facing while extending a standard Fiori application.

Context:
We were asked to extend a standard app in order to adjust a specific parameter within it. To achieve this, we used a SAPUI5 Adaptation Project from SAP Business Application Studio (BAS).

The required adjustments were successfully implemented, and the app was deployed correctly to our system. After that, the necessary Catalog, Group, and Role were created so the extended app could be used.

Initially, a custom (Z) Target Mapping was created for the extended app, based on the standard app’s target mapping, and everything was working as expected.

However, we later identified the following issue:

The standard app can be launched from other standard Fiori applications. When this navigation occurs, the standard app is always opened, but our requirement is for the extended app to be opened instead, so the requested change can be used.

To address this, we tried modifying the Target Mapping, keeping the same semantic object (or at least the same name), and removing the original target mapping, so that the apps performing the navigation would open the extended app.

This approach worked partially. For some users, the navigation opens the extended app correctly. However, when testing with other users who have more roles and profiles assigned, the system still opens the standard app instead of the extended one.

Additionally, we tried using the “Add SAP Fiori Launchpad Config” option available in SAP BAS:

However, this option does not seem to work, may be deprecated, or not supported in our system, as we receive a “URL Not Found” error.

In summary, my main question is:

How can I make standard Fiori applications open the extended app instead of the standard one?

We have already tried adjusting the target mapping and exploring Launchpad configurations, but without complete success. At this point, we have run out of ideas and would really appreciate any guidance.

Do you know of any alternative approach, recommended solution, or documentation that could help in this scenario?

Thank you for your time and for reading my question.
I look forward to your comments.

Best regards,
EBZ
